description.en: During the course, theoretical knowledges and practical skills of the functional testing methods in sports medicine and rehabilitation are introduced. Present course is a part of the " Fundamentals of Diagnostics" (AR0000016)
description.et: Omandatakse põhiteadmised spordimeditsiinis kasutatavatest funktsionaalsete reservide hindamise meetoditest. Tegemist on ühe osaga ainest "Diagnostika alused" (AR0000016).

objectives.en: The  aim of the course to give systematic overwiew and obtain basic skills and knowledges of the diagnostic methods in sports medicine: body composition measurements, preparticipation screening methods (including physical working capacity measurements) in the case of norm and pathology.
objectives.et: Anda ülevaade ja omandada põhiteadmised ja -oskused spordimeditsiinis kasutatavate diagnostiliste meetodite kohta:  keha koostise, tervisliku seisundi, funktsionaalsete näitajate ja kehalise võimekuse määramine normi ja patoloogia korral.

learning_outcomes.en: 1) during the course theoretical knowledges of the main health problems of the athletes,  preparticipation screening  as well as rehabilitation methods in sports medicine are introduced
learning_outcomes.et: 1) aine raames omandatakse põhiteadmised spordimedistiinilise tervisuuringu eesmärkide, struktuuri, kasutatavate metoodikate ja sagedamini esinevate terviskahjustuste ning taastusravi võimaluste kohta spordis.

learning_outcomes.en: 2) during the course practical skills in preparticipation screening (including EKG stress test and cardiorespiratory exercise test)  in the case of norm and pathology are acquired
learning_outcomes.et: 2) omandatakse praktilised oskused tervisliku seisundi ja kehalise võimekuse määramiseks normi ja patoloogia korral

notes.et:
Lectures are available in Moodle as video-lectures. The students can watch these at any time.
For practical classes are required to wear overall and indoor shoes.
Preparation for practical classes includes learning materials relevant to the topic (from Moodle).

independent_work.et: Materials in Moodle (e-lectures for seminars, e-book)

description.et: At the end of sports medicine course written test in Moodle is performed. Positive result: 100%.

grade_preconditions.et:
In order to pass the course:
- participation in practical classes
- multiple choice test (in Moodle)

grade_evaluation.et:
The exam is a part of the complex subject of Basics of Diagnostics (altogether 15 points). For the positive result should get at least 60% level of the possible points.

hinne A - 96-100% 
hinne B - 90-95%
hinne C - 80%-89%
hinne D - 70% - 79%
hinne E - 60-69%
hinne F - 0-59%

debt_elimination.et:
If the student is fallen ill and is not able to meet the deadline, the student must inform the teaching staff about the illness in order to arrange a new individual deadline.
Preliminary exam is obligatory for all students

assessment_scale.et: Eristav (A, B, C, D, E, F, mi)
assessment_scale.en: differentiated (A, B, C, D, E, F, not present)

resources.mandatory_materials: The lectures (e-lectures), e-book and seminar materials are available in Moodle.

description.et: video-lecture: Sports Medicine. Introduction Periodical health evaluation in athletes. Fitness and health.
video-lecture: Sports Traumatology. Part I, Part II
Introduction. Structure of preparticipation medical screening. Anamnesis, evaluation of physical development, spirometry.
Assessment of physical work capacity (PWC170). Assessment of blood pressure and heart rate during physical exercise and recovery. Cardiopulmonary exercise testing.
Interpretation of the periodical health evaluation data, analysis of the cases
